<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[City Scavenger](/Feats.aspx?ID=39) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 48 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You know that the greatest treasures often look like refuse, and you scoff at those who throw away perfectly good scraps. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to [Subsist](/Actions.aspx?ID=27), and you can use [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) or [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) when you Subsist in a settlement.

 When you Subsist in a city, you also gather valuable junk that silly longshanks threw away. You can [Earn Income](/Actions.aspx?ID=23) using Society or Survival in the same time as you Subsist, without spending any additional days of downtime. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to this check.

**Special** If you have the irongut goblin heritage, increase the bonuses to +2.
name: City Scavenger
